title: FTX lobbyist tried to buy Pacific island of Nauru to create a new superspecies, lawsuit says
description: Gabe Bankman-Fried, the younger brother of FTX's founder, tried to buy the island nation of Nauru to build a shelter to create a superhuman species in a lab.

title: Morgan Stanley credits Bidenomics for 'much stronger' than expected GDP growth
description: Biden's Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act is "driving a boom in large-scale infrastructure," wrote Morgan Stanley's chief U.S. economist.

title: ESPN held talks with NBA, NFL in search for strategic partner, sources say
description: ESPN has held early talks with the NBA and NFL as potential strategic partners, sources said.

title: Lawmakers seek review on Ford partnership with Chinese battery supplier
description: U.S. lawmakers are seeking to review a licensing deal between Ford and China-based CATL involving a planned $3.5 billion battery cell plant in Michigan.

title: Cathie Wood says her flagship innovation fund has completely exited China
description: Ark Invest's Cathie Wood said her flagship innovation fund has reduced its China exposure to zero as the developing market faces an economic slowdown.

title: 'Barbenheimer' gets off to hot start with $32.8 million in combined Thursday sales
description: "Barbenheimer" weekened begins with a bang as "Barbie" snared $22.3 million in Thursday night preview tickets, the most of any film released so far in 2023.

title: King Charles III to receive bumper pay rise after a shake-up of the British royal family’s finances
description: Organizations critical of the royal family have spoken out against the increased funding.

title: Judge sets Trump classified documents trial for May 2024, months before election
description: The ruling lands on a middle ground between the requests of Trump's legal team and federal prosecutors who pushed for the trial to begin in late 2023.

title: One of Europe's biggest food delivery firms doubles down on Middle East with $300 million Saudi deal
description: Delivery Hero, the German online food delivery company, said Friday it is taking full ownership of its Saudi subsidiary.

title: Europe braces for yet another heatwave as Greek PM warns 'hard times are clearly not over yet'
description: Europe is set for yet another heatwave in the coming days, as an oppressive "heat dome" expands over the southern half of the continent.

title: Japan's central bank has been 'wrong footed' on inflation, analyst says
description: Analysts are split over the timing of when will the BOJ tighten monetary policy, in light of the inflation numbers and wage hikes.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Tech stocks had a rough day, but that's okay
description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average outperformed other major indexes, in a stark reversal of the tech frenzy that's gripped markets since May.

title: Volvo Cars will use Tesla's Superchargers but not its autonomous driving tech. Its CEO explains why
description: The automotive industry has recently suffered issues related to supply chains and the cost of materials crucial to the production of electric vehicles.

title: Is Ukraine's counteroffensive failing? Defense experts say the risks facing Kyiv are growing
description: The window of opportunity for Kyiv's counteroffensive is small with Kyiv having only a few months to make major gains.

title: Chinese hackers breached email accounts of top U.S. diplomats
description: China-linked hackers breached the email account of U.S. Ambassador to China Nicholas Burns, as part of a recent targeted intelligence-gathering campaign, NBC News has confirmed.

title: TikTok Shop strikes 'buy now, pay later' partnership in Malaysia as part of e-commerce push
description: Atome is the BNPL arm of Singapore-based fintech firm Advance Intelligence Group, which is backed by the likes of SoftBank Vision Fund 2 and Warburg Pincus.

title: India's rice export ban could send decade-high prices spiking even further
description: India is the world's leading rice exporter, accounting for more than 40% of the global rice trade.
